body: @Quelorakath Rethikhaalis Funny. She is becoming a slut, and she is treated like a whore. I hope you're just joking with what you said. Otherwise, you're just as intelligent as the girl, then you should change that kind of mindset, especially if you have a sister, daughter, or any other young female family member.

This situation is pretty realistic, if the woman is too stupid like the girl in the story. It's simple. She is an innocent, if not stupid, girl who just wants to meet up with an online friend, but gets tricked by a bunch of assholes who want to rape her. Since she is stupid, she consents anyway. Poor girl.

@Quelorakath Rethikhaalis: LOL this comment had me laughing, thanks man, I like the irony on that. Anyway, this is pretty sloppy but nice at the same time. Nice fun read about a gullible girl for the gullibles LOL.

@Ghory the only difference between what you're trying to describe and this is the tone lol. She didn't get raped and abandoned in some ditch or made into a slave, but she still turned into a pervert in the end. They even called her as such in the story and it's pretty obvious that she's at least a little brainless/airheaded. 

It's true that this is a fairly light hearted take on the situation... The guys weren't huge assholes and she did consent, but c'mon, you were looking for a GROUP SEX hentai where the woman isn't treated like a whore... in other words a story where she'll act like one but not be treated like one?? (which I don't think this is, I mean they plain called her a slut in this lol)

FINALLY! A hentai were a girl can have sex with multiple people without becoming some brainless slut with no personality! I've been waiting for the day I would find a group sex hentai that doesn't treat women like a whore and mind real them the moment they loose their virginity.
Why can't I find a date on Tinder like this?
You meant there'll be a another one!???!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
